title: Problems with Client
body: I have lost around 50+ LP due to my client crashing in champ select. I have no idea how to fix this problem. I have tried reinstalling the game and repairing it. If anyone can help it would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Crashing in champ select is often caused by your client losing its connection to our matchmaking servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions which mostly revolve around configuring your network for League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
